name: Please (Don't) Touch the Art
summary:
Take on the role of an uncultured and unprepared art museum curator in Please (Don’t) Touch the Art, a management sim-slash-visual novel where the only thing less ready for a make-it or break-it museum exhibition than you is the artwork itself.

Get your quarrelsome gallery of talking paintings and moving statues to stop fighting before the grand gala, or watch the museum crash and burn around you – the choice is yours!
